p: Apoptotic cells manifest a loss of mitochondrial membrane potential (ΔΨm). Tow-day treatment of INS-1E cells with a cytokine cocktail reduced mitochondrial membrane potential to almost 2.5-fold as compared to the untreated controls ( Fig 3A); however, the addition of bergenin completely restored mitochondrial membrane potential in a dose-dependent manner. Beta cell mitochondrial membrane potential was increased to ˃90% of untreated levels by 5 μM bergenin ( Fig 3A).
